facts.title: UK productivity slump
facts.content: The UK's productivity is near the bottom of the G7 wealthiest nations in the world. Since 2019, it has fallen in 13 sectors that account for nearly two-thirds of UK output.

facts.title: China's bond market surge
facts.content: China's bond market has grown to become the world's second-largest, with outstanding bonds reaching $21 trillion, yet foreign ownership remains below 3% due to regulatory barriers.

facts.title: AI trading revolution
facts.content: Over 85% of equity trading volume in US markets is now executed by algorithms, with high-frequency trading accounting for nearly 50% of all trades.
